EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PCF Roadshow_Q314 - Q115.Email Confirm - Sydney 6/18
EmailTemplate.subject: You are confirmed: Pivotal Cloud Platform Roadshow - Sydney
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Pivotal Cloud Platform Roadshow in Sydney. Please find the event details below:
Date: Wednesday, June 18, 2015 Time: Registration begins @ 8:30AM/Keynote begins @9:00AM/Session #1 begins @ 10:00AM//Workshop #1 begins @ 10:45AM/Workshop #2 begins @ 12:30AM Location: Pivotal Office, Level 8, 175 Pitt St, Sydney
{{my.Save The Date - Sydney 618:default=edit me}}
Prior to the event, please create an account on Pivotal Network <https://network.pivotal.io/>. To fully participate in the workshop, bring your laptop with wireless connectivity enabled.
Questions? Please contact us via email <mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io> or visit our website <http://www.pivotal.io>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
